infos.info: During its tenure on the air this program featured most of the regular New York dramatic radio actors; the only continuing role was that of Jesus. - Source: The Big Broadcast, Frank Buxton and Bill Owen - -------------------------------------------------- - Genre: religious drama

prints.title: 4th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The
prints.author: Hickerson, Jay

synopses.synopsis: The Greatest Story Ever Told was an ambitious show, with a full orchestra and a 16-voice chorus, dramatizing the life and times of Jesus Christ. - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
